data.name: 梦回 Dream back
data.detailed_description:
Dream back Dream back is a development game.

There are many krypton life-explosive gameplays in this game, such as:
Autonomous assignment of attribute points
All map items drop randomly
Equipment production
Heart Sea Cultivation
Partner development
Wait...

In order to ensure that it is close to the people, everyone is welcome to complain, and Benbao hereby guarantees that it will do its best to repair it.
Welcome everyone here, please enjoy.
Official game exchange group: 619641228
The game is in the pre-test stage. If you find a problem to be fixed, you can join the feedback exchange group above, or directly feedback in the game. After receiving the feedback, we will deal with it first and give a satisfactory answer.
Friends who are interested in the game can also enter the official game exchange group to participate in the test.

data.short_description: Dream back Dream back is an open-world sandbox development game with rich and colorful gameplay. In order to ensure that it is close to the people, everyone is welcome to complain and feedback, and I will fix it as soon as possible. Welcome to join the QQ group exchange: 619641228

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 420
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Comments are welcome.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Comments are welcome.
